mapper.select: select rank() over (order by (CS.win*3+CS.draw*1) desc,(CS.c_ggoal-CS.c_lgoal) desc, CS.c_ggoal desc, (CS.win+CS.draw+CS.lose) asc) rno, C.cname_short, C.emblem, CS.* from club_season CS, club C where CS.ccode = C.ccode and CS.seasoncode = #{seasoncode} and CS.lcode = #{lcode}
select * from club_season where ccode = #{ccode} and seasoncode = #{seasoncode}

select * from (select CS.*, C.cname_short, C.emblem from (select rank() over (order by (win*3+draw*1) desc,(c_ggoal-c_lgoal) desc, c_ggoal desc, (win+draw+lose) asc) rno, ccode,lcode,win,draw,lose from club_season where seasoncode = #{seasoncode} and lcode = #{lcode}) CS, club C where C.ccode = CS.ccode) where rno >= #{start} and rno <= #{end} order by rno
